q_en: I am Advanced Sewers. What are the tasks I have not yet completed?
gt:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the tasks that the "Advanced Sewers" group hasn't completed yet. Here's a handy table for you:

| Task ID | Order Name               | Product Description | Attributes     | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|--------------------------|---------------------|----------------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 22      | Michael_SweaterAndShorts | Sweater             | Blue, S size   | 115            | 60               | In Progress  |
| 25      | Olivia_WinterOrder       | Coat                | Purple, S size | 75             | 75               | In Progress  |
| 33      | Emily_Pants              | Pants               | Grey, 29 size  | 120            | 0                | Not Started  |

These are the tasks that are still in progress or not started yet. Keep up the great work, and you'll have them completed in no time! üöÄ

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, planned_number, completed_number, status FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks assigned to "Advanced Sewers" that are not yet completed

steps.sql: SELECT o.order_name, p.attributes, pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id = '6';
steps.description: Retrieve the order name and product details for each task

steps.sql: SELECT o.order_name, p.attributes, pt.description FROM order_product op JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE op.id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the order name and product details for each task
